attributes.action: WILL YOU NOW EXTEND EXEMPTION FROM PENALTY TO ANYBODY WHO ATTEMPTS INCOME TAX FRAUD.
attributes.additional_details:
What we want you to do is in upper case lettering.  You seem, so often, unable to identify what it is we want you to do for us.  We hope this is helpful.

Gary Barlow's attempt at tax avoidance has been deemed illegal, therefore it MUST be attempted tax fraud?  Since he is mates with Call Me Dave he is not to be penalised.  When will Call me Dave announce that same protection from prosecution will be extended to EVERYBODY who tries and fails to avoid tax?
